meta.description: Optimize the opening of distribution centers and transportation of goods to retail stores to minimize total cost.

sets.name: STORES
sets.description: Retail stores that need to be supplied.

params.name: opening_cost
params.description: Opening cost for each distribution center.

params.name: transport_cost
params.description: Transportation cost per unit from each center to each store.

params.name: demand
params.description: Demand of each retail store in units.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Supply capacity of each distribution center in units.

vars.name: open
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if a distribution center is open.

vars.name: shipment
vars.description: Amount of goods shipped from a center to a store.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(open[c] * opening_cost[c] for c in CENTERS) + sum(shipment[c][s] * transport_cost[c][s] for c in CENTERS for s in STORES)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of opening centers and transporting goods.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_1
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 1 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_2
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 2 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_3
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 3 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_4
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 4 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_5
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 5 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_6
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 6 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_7
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 7 is met.

constraints.name: demand_satisfaction_store_8
constraints.description: Ensure demand at Store 8 is met.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_1
constraints.description: Limit shipments from Center 1 to its capacity if open.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_2
constraints.description: Limit shipments from Center 2 to its capacity if open.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_3
constraints.description: Limit shipments from Center 3 to its capacity if open.

constraints.name: capacity_limit_center_4
constraints.description: Limit shipments from Center 4 to its capacity if open.
